text: 9.10 Wkp 11.2, 11.25, 15.18, Nam 19.7, 19.11-13, Epe 2.15, Kol 2.16, 2.20, Hib 7.16 Tap God nop sɨbog ñɨbal anɨb okok, tap mɨdup anɨgɨl ñɨŋɨnɨmɨb, ñɨg ak anɨgɨl ñɨŋɨnɨmɨb, ñɨn ñɨg lɨ yokɨl anɨgɨnɨmɨb tap ak. Tap anɨb okok pen, mubwak ak tap. God agek binɨb kɨli tap nop sɨbog ñɨl, anɨgɨl gel amɨl amek, kɨdek God tap okok mɨdupsek gɨlɨtep gek tap kɨdeyɨl yenɨgab.
